headline.main: Defenders Wept After Shelling 'Too Much for Guys to Take' -- Strobing Ended With Message to Mother

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 31 -- A poignant series of radio messages from Corregidor, describing the final hour before the surrender of the Philippine fortress under shelling "too much for guys to take" was made public today by the War Department.
abstract: U S War Dept pub last radio messages from Corregidor sent by Pvt I Strobing
snippet: WASHINGTON, May 31 -- A poignant series of radio messages from Corregidor, describing the final hour before the surrender of the Philippine fortress under shelling "too much for guys to take" was made public today by the War Department....
